## Site data

```{r}
tab <- tfwdat %>%
  unite('sitedate', Site, Date, sep = ' - ') %>%   
  select(sitedate, dataCards) %>% 
  unnest('dataCards') %>% 
  arrange(sitedate, item1, item2, itemcnt) %>%
  select(item1, item2, itemcnt, sitedate)
totab <- SharedData$new(tab)

bscols(
  list(
    filter_select(id = "filter1", label = "Select site and date", sharedData = totab, group = ~sitedate, multiple = F),
  datatable(totab, extensions = "Scroller", style = "bootstrap", class = "compact", width="100%", rownames = F,
            options=list(deferRender=TRUE, scrollY=300, scroller=TRUE, dom = 'ltp',
                         columnDefs = list(list(visible = F, targets = 3))
                         ), 
            colnames = c('Item 1', 'Item 2', 'Count', 'sitedate')
    )
  )
)
```
